title: New: Heems – I Want It Bad
body: Following [**Heems**’](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11450-new-heems-computers/ "New: Heems – Computers") release, ‘**_Computers_**’, from his debut solo EP entitled **_[Nehru Jackets](http://nehrujackets.tumblr.com/)_**, he’s followed the release of the track with another cut. As far as we can tell it won’t feature on the record. It’s simple enough, an off kilter love song that rather interestingly sample **[Twin Sister](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10326-new-twin-sister-gene-campi2/ "New: Twin Sister – Gene Campi")**, yet it’s the blasé self-depreciation that cleverly forms the backbone of the record, “my heart goes stupid/My heart goes dumb”. It’s moments like this that give the track a hopeless feel, yet all with the **Das Racist** style wit that never fails to provide comfort. Not exceptional, but interesting.
